DOC.brief_title: Concurrent Chemoradiotherapy With Nedaplatin Versus Cisplatin Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Nasopharyngeal carcinoma ( NPC ) endemic Southern China Southeast Asia . Several prospective randomize trial demonstrate concurrent chemoradiotherapy superior radiotherapy alone treatment locoregionally advance NPC . Cisplatin-based chemotherapy show high response rate NPC noncisplatin regimen . However , patient ' compliance unsatisfactory obvious gastrointestinal toxicity cisplatin . Nedaplatin new second generation platinum slight gastrointestinal reaction . Our trial order study effectiveness nedaplatin cisplatin intensity-modulated radiation therapy ( IMRT ) chemoradiotherapy treat patient locoregionally advanced NPC .
